name: John G
text: Unbelievably bad. We had a stuffed crust  pizza and it was bad. The pizza was old dough. They try and save money by not throwing out the expired pizza dough.  I worked in pizza for years and I can tell when a pizza shop uses old dough …More

name: Jessica Phillips
text: Only one table. No straws or fountain drinks. No tables for wheel chair customers to sit with other customers, no handcap parking. Food was good though.

name: JUDGE JEFFREY JUSTICE FOOD COURT
text: This is now a twin trees!! Pizza hut closed 12/2017. Very good pizza and wings here!!

name: Phillip Garrett
text: This place is terrible. My husband just walked in to place an order. Three employees were working. After 3 min, not a word had been said to him! He did have the cashier look directly at him and then away. He witnessed another guy grab money …More

name: Kim L
text: Horrible customer service! Slammed the pen  down for me to sign the receipt. Was very annoyed he had to work! The only time he spoke was to say the total. RUDE....won't be going back!

name: John Ricciardiello
text: It is trying...new menu is decent. Some pizzas you cannot get elsewhere.

name: Georgianna Keegan
text: Clean and friendly staff. Food hot and fresh.
